main event: An unidentified flying object was reported by a State Trooper near Pendleton, Oregon on July 21, 1952.
interesting points: The object was metallic and cigar-shaped, approximately 50 feet long., The estimated speed of the object was very fast., The object was observed visually forMax 5 minutes without optical aids., The object was reported to be about 4,500 feet in altitude and exhibited erratic maneuvers., There were no radar contacts in the area during the sighting.
